content.text:
# 2017–18 Delaware Fightin' Blue Hens women's basketball team

The '''2017–18 Delaware Fightin' Blue Hens women's basketball team''' represented the University of Delaware during the 2017–18 NCAA Division I women's basketball season. The Fightin' Blue Hens, led by first year head coach Natasha Adair, played their home games at the Bob Carpenter Center and were members of the Colonial Athletic Association (CAA). They finished the season 19–13, 11–7 CAA play to finish in fourth place. They advanced to the semifinals of the CAA women's tournament, where they lost to Drexel. They received an at-large to the Women's National Invitation Tournament, where they lost in the first round to Georgetown.
